title: Williams 3-1 Watson
description: Williams hammers a forehand down the line to secure the first break

title: Williams 6-2 Watson
description: They follow the script and set is over in 25 minutes.  Williams chance to win moves to 96%

title: Williams 2-3 Watson
description: Serena misses a first serve - and her second goes into the net! Watson has broken!

title: Williams 4-5 Watson
description: Williams sends a forehand wide and Watson breaks and the crowd are on their feet! Watson to serve for the second set!

title: Williams 4-6 Watson
description: Watson takes the second set! Williams nets a backhand return and we are going to a decider and Heather Watson is just brilliant! The markets still think Williams has a 90% chance of victory

title: Williams 0-1 Watson
description: This could be one of the greatest days in British tennis history - because Watson breaks when Williams sends another forehand wide!

title: Williams 3-3 Watson
description: Williams takes 5 straight points to break Watsons serve

title: Williams 4-5 Watson
description: Watson breaks again and she will serve for the match!

title: Williams 5-5 Watson
description: Despite saving a string of break points Watson finally gives in and is broken

title: Williams 7-5 Watson
description: Somehow Serena Williams has won. Watson is given a standing ovation by everyone on Centre Court as he leaves
